alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 8:19PM CDT until July 16 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BUFFALO...WESTERN SHERMAN AND NORTHEASTERN DAWSON COUNTIES... At 819 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hazard to near Pleasanton to 11 miles north of Riverdale to near Amherst to Miller, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Pleasanton around 825 PM CDT. Ravenna and Poole around 830 PM CDT. Riverdale around 835 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
